verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> unto them When a man כִּ֥י <WH3588> When יַפְלִ֖א <WH6381> shall make a singular נֶ֑דֶר <WH5088> vow בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <WH6187> by thy estimation נְפָשֹׁ֖ת <WH5315> the persons לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [shall be] for the LORD

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become עֶרְכְּךָ֙ <WH6187> And thy estimation הַזָּכָ֔ר <WH2145> shall be of the male מִבֶּן֙ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> against בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <WH8346> even unto sixty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> then עֶרְכְּךָ֗ <WH6187> even thy estimation חֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <WH2572> shall be fifty שֶׁ֥קֶל <WH8255> shekels כֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> of silver בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of the sanctuary

וְאִם־ <WH518> if נְקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> And if it [be] a female הִ֑וא <WH1931> he וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> then עֶרְכְּךָ֖ <WH6187> then thy estimation שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> shall be thirty שָֽׁקֶל׃ <WH8255> shekels

וְאִ֨ם <WH518> If מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> old חָמֵ֜שׁ <WH2568> And if [it be] from five שָׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> years וְעַד֙ <WH5704> against בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> even unto twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years וְהָיָ֧ה <WH1961> then עֶרְכְּךָ֛ <WH6187> then thy estimation הַזָּכָ֖ר <WH2145> shall be of the male עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> twenty שְׁקָלִ֑ים <WH8255> shekels וְלַנְּקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> and for the female עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> ten שְׁקָלִֽים׃ <WH8255> shekels

וְאִ֣ם <WH518> if מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> old חֹ֗דֶשׁ <WH2320> And if [it be] from a month וְעַד֙ <WH5704> against בֶּן־ <WH1121> old חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> even unto five שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> then עֶרְכְּךָ֙ <WH6187> then thy estimation הַזָּכָ֔ר <WH2145> shall be of the male חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> five שְׁקָלִ֖ים <WH8255> shekels כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְלַנְּקֵבָ֣ה <WH5347> and for the female עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <WH6187> thy estimation שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> [shall be] three שְׁקָלִ֖ים <WH8255> shekels כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> of silver

וְ֠אִם <WH518> If מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> old שִׁשִּׁ֨ים <WH8346> And if [it be] from sixty שָׁנָ֤ה <WH8141> years וָמַ֙עְלָה֙ <WH4605> and above אִם־ <WH518> if זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> if [it be] a male וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> then עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <WH6187> then thy estimation חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen שָׁ֑קֶל <WH8255> shekels וְלַנְּקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> and for the female עֲשָׂרָ֥ה <WH6235> ten שְׁקָלִֽים׃ <WH8255> shekels

וְאִם־ <WH518> if מָ֥ךְ <WH4134> But if he be poorer הוּא֙ <WH1931> he מֵֽעֶרְכֶּ֔ךָ <WH6187> than thy estimation וְהֶֽעֱמִידוֹ֙ <WH5975> then he shall present לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> himself before הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְהֶעֱרִ֥יךְ <WH6186> shall value אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> and the priest עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֗י <WH6310> him according to אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after תַּשִּׂיג֙ <WH5381> ability יַ֣ד <WH3027> who הַנֹּדֵ֔ר <WH5087> that vowed יַעֲרִיכֶ֖נּוּ <WH6186> value הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> shall the priest ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> now if בְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> And if [it be] a beast אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יַקְרִ֧יבוּ <WH7126> whereof men bring מִמֶּ֛נָּה <WH4480> as קָרְבָּ֖ן <WH7133> an offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כֹּל֩ <WH3605> any אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> such יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> all that [any man] giveth מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> at לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of such unto the LORD יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become קֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> shall be holy

לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יַחֲלִיפֶ֗נּוּ <WH2498> He shall not alter וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> or יָמִ֥יר <WH4171> it nor change אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> ט֥וֹב <WH2896> it a good בְּרָ֖ע <WH7451> for a bad אוֹ־ <WH176> or רַ֣ע <WH7451> or a bad בְּט֑וֹב <WH2896> for a good וְאִם־ <WH518> if הָמֵ֨ר <WH4171> and if he shall at all יָמִ֤יר <WH4171> change בְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> beast בִּבְהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> for beast וְהָֽיָה־ <WH1961> shall become ה֥וּא <WH1931> and its וּתְמוּרָת֖וֹ <WH8545> then it and the exchange יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> shall become קֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> thereof shall be holy

וְאִם֙ <WH518> If כָּל־ <WH3605> is any בְּהֵמָ֣ה <WH929> beast טְמֵאָ֔ה <WH2931> And if [it be] any unclean אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not יַקְרִ֧יבוּ <WH7126> of which they do not offer מִמֶּ֛נָּה <WH4480> as קָרְבָּ֖ן <WH7133> a sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְהֶֽעֱמִ֥יד <WH5975> then he shall present אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> the beast לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest

וְהֶעֱרִ֤יךְ <WH6186> shall value הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> And the priest אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> בֵּ֥ין <WH996> it whether ט֖וֹב <WH2896> it be good וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> or רָ֑ע <WH7451> bad כְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <WH6187> as thou valuest הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> it [who art] the priest כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וְאִם־ <WH518> if גָּאֹ֖ל <WH1350> But if he will at all יִגְאָלֶ֑נָּה <WH1350> redeem וְיָסַ֥ף <WH3254> it then he shall add חֲמִישִׁת֖וֹ <WH2549> a fifth עַל־ <WH5921> of עֶרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <WH6187> [part] thereof unto thy estimation

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And when a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> now if יַקְדִּ֨שׁ <WH6942> shall sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית֥וֹ <WH1004> his house קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> [to be] holy לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְהֶעֱרִיכוֹ֙ <WH6186> shall estimate הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> then the priest בֵּ֥ין <WH996> either ט֖וֹב <WH2896> it whether it be good וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> or רָ֑ע <WH7451> or bad כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יַעֲרִ֥יךְ <WH6186> shall estimate אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> as the priest כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so יָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> it so shall it stand

וְאִ֨ם־ <WH518> if הַמַּקְדִּ֔ישׁ <WH6942> And if he that sanctified יִגְאַ֖ל <WH1350> it will redeem אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> his house וְ֠יָסַף <WH3254> then he shall add חֲמִישִׁ֧ית <WH2549> the fifth כֶּֽסֶף־ <WH3701> [part] of the money עֶרְכְּךָ֛ <WH6187> of thy estimation עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and וְהָ֥יָה <WH1961> become לֽוֹ׃

וְאִ֣ם ׀ <WH518> if מִשְּׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> [some part] of a field אֲחֻזָּת֗וֹ <WH272> of his possession יַקְדִּ֥ישׁ <WH6942> shall sanctify אִישׁ֙ <WH376> And if a man לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> then עֶרְכְּךָ֖ <WH6187> then thy estimation לְפִ֣י <WH6310> shall be according זַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> to the seed זֶ֚רַע <WH2233> seed חֹ֣מֶר <WH2563> thereof an homer שְׂעֹרִ֔ים <WH8184> of barley בַּחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> [shall be valued] at fifty שֶׁ֥קֶל <WH8255> shekels כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> of silver

אִם־ <WH518> If מִשְּׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> from the year הַיֹּבֵ֖ל <WH3104> of jubile יַקְדִּ֣ישׁ <WH6942> If he sanctify שָׂדֵ֑הוּ <WH7704> his field כְּעֶרְכְּךָ֖ <WH6187> according to thy estimation יָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> it shall stand

וְאִם־ <WH518> If אַחַ֣ר <WH310> after הַיֹּבֵל֮ <WH3104> the jubile יַקְדִּ֣ישׁ <WH6942> But if he sanctify שָׂדֵהוּ֒ <WH7704> his field וְחִשַּׁב־ <WH2803> shall reckon ל֨וֹ הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> then the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> unto him the money עַל־ <WH5921> and פִּ֤י <WH6310> according to הַשָּׁנִים֙ <WH8141> the years הַנּ֣וֹתָרֹ֔ת <WH3498> that remain עַ֖ד <WH5704> until שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> even unto the year הַיֹּבֵ֑ל <WH3104> of the jubile וְנִגְרַ֖ע <WH1639> and it shall be abated מֵֽעֶרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <WH6187> from thy estimation

וְאִם־ <WH518> If גָּאֹ֤ל <WH1350> will in any wise יִגְאַל֙ <WH1350> redeem אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> the field הַמַּקְדִּ֖ישׁ <WH6942> And if he that sanctified אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וְ֠יָסַף <WH3254> it then he shall add חֲמִשִׁ֧ית <WH2549> the fifth כֶּֽסֶף־ <WH3701> [part] of the money עֶרְכְּךָ֛ <WH6187> of thy estimation עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> unto וְקָ֥ם <WH6965> unto it and it shall be assured לֽוֹ׃

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֤א <WH3808> may no יִגְאַל֙ <WH1350> And if he will not redeem אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> the field וְאִם־ <WH518> if מָכַ֥ר <WH4376> or if he have sold אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> the field לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> to another לֹ֥א <WH3808> may no יִגָּאֵ֖ל <WH1350> it shall not be redeemed עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> longer

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become הַשָּׂדֶ֜ה <WH7704> But the field בְּצֵאת֣וֹ <WH3318> when it goeth out בַיֹּבֵ֗ל <WH3104> in the jubile קֹ֛דֶשׁ <WH6944> shall be holy לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> as a field הַחֵ֑רֶם <WH2764> devoted לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> thereof shall be the priest's תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become אֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH272> the possession

וְאִם֙ <WH518> if אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> a field מִקְנָת֔וֹ <WH4736> which he hath bought אֲשֶׁ֕ר <WH834> which לֹ֖א <WH3808> A part מִשְּׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> which [is] not of the fields אֲחֻזָּת֑וֹ <WH272> of his possession יַקְדִּ֖ישׁ <WH6942> And if [a man] sanctify לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְחִשַּׁב־ <WH2803> shall reckon ל֣וֹ הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> Then the priest אֵ֚ת <WH853> מִכְסַ֣ת <WH4373> unto him the worth הָֽעֶרְכְּךָ֔ <WH6187> of thy estimation עַ֖ד <WH5704> up שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> [even] unto the year הַיֹּבֵ֑ל <WH3104> of the jubile וְנָתַ֤ן <WH5414> and he shall give אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֶרְכְּךָ֙ <WH6187> thine estimation בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> as קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [as] a holy thing לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <WH8141> In the year הַיּוֹבֵל֙ <WH3104> of the jubile יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> shall return הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> the field לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom קָנָ֖הוּ <WH7069> unto him of whom it was bought מֵאִתּ֑וֹ <WH853> לַאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to whom ל֖וֹ אֲחֻזַּ֥ת <WH272> [even] to him to whom the possession הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Every עֶרְכְּךָ֔ <WH6187> And all thy estimations יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> shall be after בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> shall be according to the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty גֵּרָ֖ה <WH1626> gerahs יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become הַשָּֽׁקֶל׃ <WH8255> shall be the shekel ס

אַךְ־ <WH389> However בְּכ֞וֹר <WH1060> Only the firstling אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְבֻכַּ֤ר <WH1069> firstling לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> which should be the LORD'S בִּבְהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> of the beasts לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יַקְדִּ֥ישׁ <WH6942> shall sanctify אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> no man אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> אִם־ <WH518> whether שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> it whether [it be] ox אִם־ <WH518> or שֶׂ֔ה <WH7716> or sheep לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> it [is] the LORD'S הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאִ֨ם <WH518> if בַּבְּהֵמָ֤ה <WH929> beast הַטְּמֵאָה֙ <WH2931> And if [it be] of an unclean וּפָדָ֣ה <WH6299> then he shall redeem בְעֶרְכֶּ֔ךָ <WH6187> [it] according to thine estimation וְיָסַ֥ף <WH3254> and shall add חֲמִשִׁת֖וֹ <WH2549> a fifth עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> of וְאִם־ <WH518> and if לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not יִגָּאֵ֖ל <WH1350> [part] of it thereto or if it be not redeemed וְנִמְכַּ֥ר <WH4376> then it shall be sold בְּעֶרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <WH6187> according to thy estimation
